item.title: Myanmar Rebels Are Opening Colleges
item.description: As Myanmar’s civil war heads into a fifth year, anti-junta forces are opening universities and colleges as part of their pursuit of a federal democrac...

item.title: Trump Says He Will Reach Out to North Korean Leader Kim Jong-un
item.description: North Korea’s leader has grown more assertive since their last efforts at diplomacy ended in failure — and now has Russia at his side.

item.title: Israel Says UNRWA Has 6 Days to Halt Operations in East Jerusalem
item.description: The directive came in a letter to the U.N., after the Israeli Parliament banned the relief agency that has aided Palestinian refugees for decades.

item.title: What Elon Musk’s Salute Was All About
item.description: A gesture associated with the Nazis has a surprising history. But in Germany, there was little doubt about its meaning.

item.title: Arthur Blessitt, Who Carried a Cross Around the World, Dies at 84
item.description: A street preacher from Hollywood, he set out on a walk to New York City in 1969 with a 110-pound cross on his back. Then he kept going.
